title: Trouser & Skirt Hangers with Clips 40 Pack - Pant Hangers with Adjustment Metal Grip Clips for Kids Adults, Heavy Duty Durable, Black
features: [High Quality Skirt Hangers] - Our Trousers Hangers are made of metal material, sturdy, durable and prevents rust. There are not easy to bend and more durable than wooden hangers or plastic hangers.
[Trouser Hangers No Wrinkles] - Trouser Hangers with clips has a powerful grip. The rubber coating on clamp to hold items in place and ensure that the pants are flat and not wrinkled.

[Clip hangers Adjustable] - Hanger clips With 2 adjustable clips, you can slide the 2 clips to adjust the width of the trouser hanger. These clip hanger suitable for different size of your coat, jeans, socks or whatever you would like to hang.

[Hangers with Clips Ultra-thin] - Skirt Hanger with ultra-thin design, they are flexible and lightweight, so can save a lot of space. These pant hanger can make your closet cleaner and tidy. Make more convenient and improve your quality of life.

[Clip hanger Multiple uses] - These skirt hangers with clips are perfect for hanging pants, skirts, jeans, shorts and whatever you can amagine. If you have any question about trouser hangers space saving, please contact us. We 'll solve for you as soon as posible.
